settings.name: Edge size
settings.description: Define edge size to view coastlines (in degrees of lon/lat)

settings.name: Colour specification for track lines
settings.description: Provide one or more colour names for your tracks being plotted on the OpenStreetMap background. Use colour names as listed here: https://www.r-graph-gallery.com/42-colors-names.html or available by typing `colors()` into an R console. If you provide more than one colour, please separate the colour names by comme and make sure that the number corresponds to the number of animals in your dataset.
